description:
A transfer student that joined Nao`s class who is also Shuusuke`s childhood friend.
Ten years ago she made a promise to Shuusuke but then had to transfer away due to her father`s work. Ever since then she has been waiting to reunite with Shuusuke so that she can get him to fulfill that promise. She has a very calculating and assertive personality, and that assertive personality comes out the most whenever she is with Shuusuke.
She lives on the top floor in an apartment building, where she has set up a telescope so that she can spy on Shuusuke in his room.
name: Tsuchiura Iroha
